name: Jetpackman VS Bouncy World
description:
Jetpackman VS Bouncy World

What is this?

Jetpackman VS Bouncy World is a game about invading a little bouncy planet just as an excuse to use your jetpack

Instructions

Bassically just land on top of the tanks, the damage you do is proportional to the speed of the hit

Disclaimer

This game was made in 48h for the Ludum Dare #38
